Export.Routine:
WWWSAVE
#include COMSYS #include WWWConst
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; SPEICHERN FORMULAR ; ; JW - Note: A manual form does not run OnBeforeSave code. ; ; Called by : User.www.cls based on entry point in form. ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; ----- Entry point drops through to START -----
START ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History : ; 06-Jan-2011 GRF SR17579: Use explicit tag ; 04-Nov-2009 shobby SR16935: Restrictions on 'Demo' User are now determined by ; whether 'User Acess' as 33-Demo User. Rather than ; being hardcoded to the user DEMO. ; 06-Nov-2008 shobby SR16123: Standardised routine to determine InputType ; 16-Oct-2008 FIS SR15947: UNDEF problem corrected; Re-done changes for ; readabilty as $ztrap must be in same line; Turned ; logic around to wrap Save and AfterSave as one ; unit by default ; 16-Oct-2008 GRF SR15947: $get added around strTStatus since getting ; UNDEFINED error (Not setting when form switch is ; off); break up multi-set for readability. ; 02-Oct-2008 FIS SR15947: Use DoNotPrepareHTMLSkeleton flag for old ; execute as well ; 30-Sep-2008 FIS SR15947: Changed WWWTransactionTable into ; WWWTransactionLine ; 29-Sep-2008 FIS SR15947: Option to Trigger OnSave and OnAfterSave as one ; Transaction Unit ; 26-Sep-2008 FIS SR15947: Transaction Wrapper for "Execute After Save" ; implemented ; 07-Aug-2008 FIS SR15828: compare stored data with WWWDATEN2 to stop save ; if data has been changed by a different process. ; Not activated yet because it also gets checked in ; BeforeSave^WWWFORMValidation (might be enough) ; 04-Aug-2008 FIS SR15824: keep record as readonly even when the lock ; has been released (data may be not up to date) ; 12-Dec-2007 shobby SRBR014737: If idType can't be found from the form ; use the class. ; 26-Nov-2007 GM/Shobby SRBR014737: Get values from $$get^WWW122() ; 05-Nov-2007 shobby SRBR014748: Use standard routine to validate password. ; 22-May-2007 RGB SRBR014456: Added the pblnDoOnBeforeSave parameter ; for the WWWSPEI call ; 13-Mar-2007 GRF SR12505: Doco ; 21-Sep-2006 JW SR15062: Removed FINGLBankRecon exception ; 08-Aug-2006 JW SR13594: Cleaned up. Brace syntax ; 07-Feb-2006 JW SR13305: FINGLBankRecon exception. ; 18-Jul-2006 JW SR14862: Decode VARHooks status ; 13-Apr-2006 SC SR14414: Moved VARHooks to WWWSPEI. Pass strStatus to ; SPEI byref, allows VARCode to return an error msg. ; Display error if returned. ; 09-Dec-2005 JW SR13195: Quit if trying to overwrite stored data ; 31-Oct-2005 GRF SR13627: Doco ; 02-Sep-2005 JW SR12966: Fixed WWWUSER locks ; 16-Aug-2005 JW SR12290: Get old YFELD to compare against. ; 07-Jul-2005 shobby SR12892: WWW126,WWW1261,WWW1262 are no longer shared. ; 30-May-2005 RPW SR12056: Attempt at Performance Increase ; 05.08.1997 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new (%request,%session,%KEY,%,%ZCS,%CGIEVAR)
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; YVOR objWWW120 Form Definition ^WWW120(0,YFORM,1) ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
DO ^WWWVAR
SET $ZTRAP="^WWWERROR" IF YUSER'="" DO . SET $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" . SET $$$WWWUSERBODYStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" . SET $$$WWWUSERFormStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" . SET $$$WWWUSERFormHeaderDisplayed(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))=""
IF $GET(YHYPER)'=1 IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"YEND"))'=1 DO DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;UNVOLLSTAENDIG!KEIN SAVE . IF YFORM'="" KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D")
IF YTRAKT0=1 KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D") DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;FALSCHE TRANSAKTIONSNR
IF $GET(YSCREENM)=1 KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D") DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;SCREEN EDIT FUNKTION
;OPTIONEN SICHERN UND NEUSTART ;safeguard And IF YFORM'="" IF YOPTION="" IF $DATA(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1")) IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="HELP" SET %("VAR","EP")="WWWHELP" DO ^WWWHELP QUIT ;HILFE BEI OPTION;TYBD;8,7,2004;26060;
IF YFORM'="" IF YOPTION="" IF $DATA(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1")) SET YOPTION=%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1") DO DO ^WWWFORM QUIT . KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D") . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1",YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . SET:YOPTION'="" YOPTION=YOPTION_";" . . IF $GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1",YI))'="" SET YOPTION=YOPTION_$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"O1",YI)) . ; . SET %("VAR","YOPTION")=YOPTION
SET YTIMEFORM = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YTIMEFORM")) ;SAVE EINER ZEITABHÄNGIGEN ERFASSUNG ;unit logging SET YOPEN = $GET(%(YQUERY,"YOPEN")) ;OPEN ODER SAVE <-- Setting of YOPEN
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;YOPEN=0 = SAVE ;YOPEN=1 = OPEN ;YOPEN=1x = Open the last record ;YOPEN=2 = SAVE SEITENWECHSEL - save page overflows ;YOPEN="SAVE"_XXXXX = Special save with function ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN)=1 SET YOPEN1 = $EXTRACT(YOPEN,2,99) SET YOPEN=1 ;VORLETZTER DATENSATZ ;data record
IF YFORM="" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(35)) quit ; "No Form Default" IF '$DATA(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(35)) quit ; "No Form Default" SET YKFEHL=0 DO ^WWWSAVV ;VORGABEN AUS CGI ;out of if YOPEN="X" DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT("WWW00035")) quit ; "Cannot save, record already exists."
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; sets ; YALLKEY ; YVOR ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,6)="SAVEWV" DO ;WIEDERVORLAGEN . NEW DATE,HW,YDATEI,YBED1 . SET YBED1=YBED . SET HW=$PIECE(YOPEN," ",2,99) . IF $PIECE(HW," ",1)'="" IF $DATA(^WWW013(0,$PIECE(HW," ",1),1)) SET YBED1=$PIECE(HW," ",1) SET HW=$PIECE(HW," ",2,99) ;WIEDERVORLAGE AND JEMANDEN ANDERES . SET DATE = $$^WWWDATE1($EXTRACT($PIECE(YOPEN," ",1),7,20)) . IF +DATE=0 SET DATE = +$HOROLOG . IF +DATE'=0 DO . . SET YDATEI=$$$WWW120ClassUsedInForm(YVOR) . . SET YMAXKEY=0 . . IF YDATEI'="" SET YMAXKEY=+$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . . SET YKEY="" . . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY QUIT:'$DATA(YKEY(1)) SET YKEY=YKEY_YKEY(YI) IF YI'=YMAXKEY IF $GET(YKEY(YI+1))'="" SET YKEY=YKEY_"," . . SET ^WWWWV(YM,YBED1,DATE,YFORM,$TRANSLATE(YKEY,",","/"),1)=+$HOROLOG_Y_$PIECE($HOROLOG,",",2)_Y_YBED_Y_HW . ; . SET YOPEN=2
;SPECIAL VARIABLE IF $ORDER(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V",""))'="" DO . NEW YVAR . SET YVAR="" . FOR SET YVAR=$ORDER(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YVAR)) QUIT:YVAR="" DO . . SET %(YQUERY,YVAR)=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V",YVAR,1))
KILL ^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"V")
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 8 : WIZARD ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=8 DO QUIT . do Wizard()
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 6 : MENU INPUT TYPE ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=6 DO QUIT . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="HELP" SET %("VAR","EP")="WWWHELP" DO ^WWWHELP ;ZUM HILFETEXT
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 7 : SEARCH ENGINE ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=7 DO QUIT . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="HELP" SET %("VAR","EP")="WWWHELP" DO ^WWWHELP QUIT ;ZUM HILFETEXT . DO ^WWWFORM ;SUCHMASCHINE
;--------------
SET YDATEI = $$$WWW120ClassUsedInForm(YVOR)
;------------------- ;New Tab ;------------------- IF YOPEN=2 SET YQ=0 DO KILL ^WWWDUMMY(YUSER) QUIT:YQ=1 ;NUR SEITENWECHSEL ;only . SET YABBR=0 . IF YDATEI'="" SET YI="" FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO QUIT:YABBR=1 ;PRIMÄRSCHL. . . SET YTYP=$PIECE($GET(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,3) . . ;DO PRUEFP^WWWSAVP ;PRUEFEN KEY . . IF '$DATA(YKEY(YI)) SET YABBR=1 QUIT . . IF YKEY(YI)="" SET YABBR=1 QUIT . . SET YKEY(YI)=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YKEY(YI)) . ; . IF YDATEI'="" SET YI="" FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . set YTYP = $$GetInputType(YDATEI,YI,YFORM) . . SET $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)) . ; . SET ^WWWDUMMY(YUSER,"P") = $GET(YKEY(1))_","_$GET(YKEY(2))_","_$GET(YKEY(3))_","_$GET(YKEY(4))_","_$GET(YKEY(5))_","_$GET(YKEY(6))_","_$GET(YKEY(7))_","_$GET(YKEY(8)) . SET ^WWWDUMMY(YUSER,"D") = YFELD . SET ^WWWDUMMY(YUSER,"M") = YMFELD . IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)=1 DO . . SET %("VAR","YFORM")=YFORM_"t" ;ZEITABHÄNGIGE VORGABE ;default . . IF YDATEI'="" DO ;SICHER DATEN FÜR SEITENWECHSEL ;sure to . . . SET YMAXKEY=+$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . . . SET $PIECE(^WWWDUMMY(YUSER,"P"),",",YMAXKEY+1) = $$^WWWDATE1($GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"P"_(YMAXKEY+1)))) . ; . DO ^WWWFORM SET YQ=1
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 1 : STANDARD FORM ; Form Type 3 : GRID FORM ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$WWW120SaveAlsoWithoutDataFields(YVOR)'=1 IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=1||($$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3) IF YOPEN=0||(YOPEN=2) IF YFELD=$GET(^WWW1261(YM,YFORM,1)) DO . IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3 IF $GET(YMAXKEY)=1 QUIT ;NICHT;TYBD;13,10,2004 . SET YOPEN=1 ;NEUER DATENSATZ OHNE WERTE SPEICHERN ODER NICHT ;data record without Save Or Not
;ALTE VORGABE SCHLUESSEL UND ÖFFNEN ALTEN DATENSATZ ;default And unclose data record IF $GET(YOPEN1)'="" IF (YALLKEY=1) || (YALLKEY=2) SET YI="",YKEY="" FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YBED,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . SET YKEY(YI)=$GET(^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YBED,YI,1)) ;LETZTER DATENSATZ ;last data record . IF $GET(YOPEN1)'="" SET YKEY(YI)=$GET(^WWW1262(YM,YFORM,YBED,YOPEN1,YI,1)) ;VORLETZTER DATENSATZ ;data record . IF YKEY(YI)'="" SET:YKEY'="" YKEY=YKEY_"," SET YKEY=YKEY_YKEY(YI) . SET YALLKEY=9
; shobby --------------------------- SR12442 ; The previous section may have failed because an item has just been deleted meaning that it is no longer ; in WWW126, although WWW1262 is still valid. IF $GET(YOPEN1)'="" IF (YALLKEY=1) || (YALLKEY=2) SET YI="",YKEY="" FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW1262(YM,YFORM,YBED,YOPEN1,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . SET YKEY(YI)=$GET(^WWW1262(YM,YFORM,YBED,YOPEN1,YI,1)) ;LETZTER DATENSATZ ;last data record . IF YKEY(YI)'="" SET:YKEY'="" YKEY=YKEY_"," SET YKEY=YKEY_YKEY(YI) . SET YALLKEY=9 ; shobby ---------------------------
;ALTE VORGABE SCHLUESSEL UND ÖFFNEN ALTEN DATENSATZ ;default And unclose data record IF YOPEN=1 IF $DATA(YKEY(1)) IF (YKEY(1)="") || (YKEY(1)="+") IF $TRANSLATE(YKEY,",+"_"""")="" IF ($TRANSLATE(YFELD,Y_"0 ,.")=$TRANSLATE($GET(^WWW1261(YM,YFORM,1)),Y_"0 ,.")) || ($TRANSLATE($GET(^WWW1261(YM,YFORM,1)),Y_"0 ,.")="") IF YALLKEY=1 SET YI="",YKEY="" FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YBED,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . SET YKEY(YI) = $GET(^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YBED,YI,1)) ;LETZTER DATENSATZ ;last data record . IF $GET(YOPEN1)'="" SET YKEY(YI) = $GET(^WWW1262(YM,YFORM,YBED,YOPEN1,YI,1)) ;VORLEZTER DATENSATZ ;data record . IF YKEY(YI)'="" SET:YKEY'="" YKEY=YKEY_"," SET YKEY = YKEY_YKEY(YI) . SET YALLKEY=9
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ;SUCHEN SCHLÜSSEL OHNE PRIMÄRSCHL ;seek key without IF YALLKEY=1 IF $GET(YKEY(1))="" IF $TRANSLATE(YFELD,Y)'="" IF '$DATA(^WWW002(0,YDATEI)) DO PRIM^WWWLOOK IF YKEY'="" SET YALLKEY=9
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 3 : GRID FORM ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $GET(YOPEN)=1 IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3 IF (YALLKEY=1) || (YALLKEY=2) DO IF YALLKEY=0 QUIT ;DATEN AUS GRID GEFUNDEN;TYBD;10,04,2003 . QUIT:YDATEI="" . SET YMAXKEY=+$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . QUIT:YMAXKEY<2 ;KEIN GRID MIT MEHR ;no by means of more . IF YALLKEY=2 IF $GET(YKEY(YMAXKEY))'="+" QUIT ;LETZTE KEY NICHT + ABER VOLLSTÄNDIG ;last KEY Not yet integral . SET YKEY="" . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY-1 SET YKEY=YKEY_$GET(YKEY(YI)) IF YI'=YMAXKEY SET YKEY=YKEY_"," . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY . SET %("VAR","YNEW")=1 . DO ^WWWFORM . SET YALLKEY=0
;SUCHEN KEYVORGABE MIT ANZEIGE AUSWAHL KEY ;seek by means of Show Selection KEY IF $GET(YKEY(1))'="+" IF $GET(YKEY(2))'="+" IF $GET(YKEY(3))'="+" IF $GET(YKEY(4))'="+" IF $GET(YKEY(5))'="+" IF YRICHT="" IF YALLKEY=2 IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)'="SAVE" DO . QUIT:'$DATA(^WWW121(0,YFORM)) ;KEINE PRIMÄRSCHL ;no . DO KEY^WWWLOOK . SET YALLKEY=1 . IF YKEY'="" SET YALLKEY=9 ;SUCHEN PASSENDEN DATENSATZ ;seek data record
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF YFORM="WWW120" SET $$$WWW013LastFormUsed(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)) = $GET(YKEY(1)) ;VORGABE TEST ;default Test
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 1 : STANDARD FORM ; Form Type 3 : GRID FORM ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;AUSWAHL DATENSATZ AUS FELDERN ;Selection data record out of if YRICHT="" IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=1||($$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3) IF YALLKEY=1 IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)'="SAVE" DO QUIT . DO ^WWWINFO($GET(YKEY(1))_" "_$GET(YKEY(2))_" "_$GET(YKEY(3))_" "_$GET(YKEY(4))_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(86)) ;TYBD;4,2,2004;NICHT VORHANDEN . ;DO ANZEIGE^WWWLOOK QUIT ;MIT ANZEIGE;TYBD;4,2,2004
;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF YRICHT="" IF ($$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3) || ($$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=1) IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)'="SAVE" IF $TRANSLATE(YFELD,Y)="" IF (YKEY(1)="") || ($GET(YKEY(1))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(2))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(3))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(4))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(5))="+") DO ANZEIGE^WWWLOOK QUIT ;MIT ANZEIGE ;by means of Show ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;NÄCHSER DATENSATZ ;data record IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)'="SAVE" IF YRICHT'="" SET YKEY="" IF (YKEY(1)="") || ($GET(YKEY(1))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(2))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(3))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(4))="+") || ($GET(YKEY(5))="+") SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,15)="" DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;DATENSATZ ÖFFNEN ;data record unclose IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)'="SAVE" IF YALLKEY=9 DO DO ^WWWFORM QUIT . IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)=1 DO . . SET %("VAR","YFORM")=YFORM_"t" ;ZEITABHÄNGIGE VORGABE ;default . . IF $GET(YDATEI)'="" DO ;SICHER DATEN FÜR SEITENWECHSEL ;sure to . . . SET YMAXKEY=+$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . . . SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",YMAXKEY+1)=$$^WWWDATE1($GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"P"_(YMAXKEY+1)))) . . . SET $PIECE(^WWWDUMMY(YUSER,"P"),",",YMAXKEY+1)=$$^WWWDATE1($GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"P"_(YMAXKEY+1)))) . ; . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY
; OPEN ; IF (YRICHT="") && (YOPEN=1) DO QUIT ;WENN ÖFFNEN DURCH SEITENWECHSEL ;when unclose trans- . SET %("VAR","YKEY")="" . SET %("VAR","YSEITE")="" . SET YSEITE=1 . DO ^WWWFORM
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 2 : LIST GENERATOR LISTEN FELDDEFINITIONEN - LISTEN VORGABEN ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SET Q=0 IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=2 DO . FOR YI=1:1:5 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"LR"_YI_"")) IF YA'="" SET YLR(YI)=YA ;RICHTUNG LISTGENERATORFILES ;trend . FOR YI1=1:1:5 FOR YI=1:1:10 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"LP"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)_"")) DO MULTL^WWWSAVV("Y"_YFORM_"LP"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)) IF YA'="" SET YLP(YI1,$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3))=YA ;LISTGENERATOR PRIMÄRSCHL . FOR YI1=1:1:5 FOR YI=1:1:10 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"LP1"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)_"")) DO MULTL^WWWSAVV("Y"_YFORM_"LP1"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)) IF YA'="" SET YLP1(YI1,$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3))=YA ;LISTGENERATOR PRIMÄRSCHL BIS ;until . FOR YI1=1:1:5 FOR YI=1:1:99 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"LD"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)_"")) DO MULTL^WWWSAVV("Y"_YFORM_"LD"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)) IF YA'="" SET YLD(YI1,$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3))=YA ;LISTGENERATOR DATENFELDER . FOR YI1=1:1:5 FOR YI=1:1:99 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"LD1"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)_"")) DO MULTL^WWWSAVV("Y"_YFORM_"LD1"_YI1_$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3)) IF YA'="" SET YLD1(YI1,$EXTRACT(100+YI,2,3))=YA ;LISTGENERATOR DATENFELDER BIS ;until . FOR YI=1:1:5 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"S"_YI_"")) IF YA'="" SET YS(YI)=YA,SORT(YI)=YA,SORT=YA ;SORTIERUNGEN . FOR YI=1:1:20 SET YA=$GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"M"_YI_"")) IF YA'="" SET YM(YI)=YA ;MANUELLE IN EINER LISTE ;within unit list
IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,"BIT")) { KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) } ELSE { KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,1) KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,2) KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"PAGE") }
IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,1,4)="SAVE" DO QUIT ;DATEN ZWISCHENSPEICHERN WEGEN SUCHE/HILFE/BUTTON ;quibble . do BufferSave()
KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER)
; Check User SET YBED=$$$UPPER(YBED) IF '$DATA(^WWW013(0,YBED)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT SET YVORM=^WWW013(0,YBED,1) IF '$$CHECK^WWWPWDCHECK($$$WWW013Password1(YVORM),YPWD) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT SET YBER=$$$WWW013UserAccess(YVORM) SET YMOD=$$$WWW013Module1(YVORM)
DO ^WWWFORMX ;VORGABEN
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; D22 $$$WWW120UserAccess() ; D23 $$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData() ; D24 $$$WWW120Modules() ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ IF ($$$WWW120UserAccess(YVOR)'="") || ($$$WWW120Modules(YVOR)'="") IF $$^WWWACCESS($$$WWW120UserAccess(YVOR)_";"_$$$WWW120DUserAccess($get(^WWW120D(0,YFORM,0,1))),$$$WWW120Modules(YVOR))'=1 SET Q=0 DO IF Q=0 DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BERECHTIGUNGEN;AUCH ERLAUBT WENN MITARBEITERMENÜ;FIS;26637;27.10.04 . NEW SONDERMENU . IF ($PIECE($GET(YANZ),",",1)="") || ($PIECE($GET(YANZ),",",2)="") QUIT . SET SONDERMENU=$PIECE($GET(^WWW0132(0,YBED,YM,$PIECE(YANZ,",",1),1)),Y,1) . IF SONDERMENU'="" IF $FIND(";"_SONDERMENU_";",";"_$PIECE(YANZ,",",2)_";") SET Q=1 ;ACHTUNG ! NUR PRÜFUNG DES OBER-MENÜPUNKTES
IF $$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData(YVOR)=$$$EnumReadOnly DO QUIT . SET $$$WWWUSERLastFormfield(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" . SET YKEY="" . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY QUIT:'$DATA(YKEY(YI)) SET YKEY=YKEY_YKEY(YI) IF YI'=YMAXKEY IF $GET(YKEY(YI+1))'="" SET YKEY=YKEY_"," . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY ;KEY . DO ^WWWFORM
IF $EXTRACT(YFORM,1,3)="WWW" if (","_$$^WWWBEDBER(YBED)_",")[(",33,") DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(12)) QUIT ;"DEMO" ; "Attention! Access Denied!"
SET Q=0 IF $DATA(^WWW122s(0,4," ",YFORM)) DO ^WWWSAVM IF Q=1 QUIT ;MANUELLE
;NORMALER DATENSATZ SPEICHERN ;data record Save KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER,"PAGE") ;TYBD;10,2,2004 LOCK +^WWWUSER(0,YUSER):3 ;SICHERN FÜR 2 CLICKS TYBD;30.12.2002 ;safeguard to SET YFELD=$TRANSLATE(YFELD,$CHAR(13,10),"|") ;TEXTE IF $EXTRACT(YFELD,$LENGTH(YFELD))="|" SET YFELD=$EXTRACT(YFELD,1,$LENGTH(YFELD)-1) SET YABBR=0 SET YDATEI=$PIECE(YVOR,Y,11)
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Forms other than ; Form Type 2 : LIST GENERATOR ; Form Type 4 : MANUAL INPUT (WITH BUTTON) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)'=4 IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)'=2 IF YDATEI'="" DO LOCK -^WWWUSER(0,YUSER) QUIT . NEW Q,YLINK . SET YOK=1 . SET YLFZ=0 . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; Key Validation . ;------------------------------------- . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO QUIT:YABBR=1 ;PRIMÄRSCHL. . . IF $GET(YKEY(YI))'="" IF YBED'="" SET ^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YBED,YI,1)=$GET(YKEY(YI)) SET ^WWW126(YM,YFORM,YUSER,YI,1)=$GET(YKEY(YI)) ;SPEICH DFLT . . SET YTYP=$PIECE($GET(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,3) . . DO PRUEFP^WWWSAVP . . IF '$DATA(YKEY(YI)) SET YABBR=1 SET YOK=0 QUIT . . IF YKEY(YI)="" SET YABBR=1 SET YOK=0 QUIT . . SET YKEY(YI)=$$GetInternal^WWWTR(YTYP,YKEY(YI)) . ; . IF YOK=0 IF YRICHT'="" SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,15)="" DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;DATENFELDER DURCHGEHEN ;peruse data fields . IF YOK=0 DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(59)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(86)) QUIT ; "Primary Key Not Available!" . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; . ; Set oldYFELD to stored record. . SET YMAXKEY=+$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . IF YMAXKEY=0 SET YMAXKEY=1 ;AUTOMATISCH LFD NUMMER ;automatic numeral . SET myYKEY="" . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY QUIT:'$DATA(YKEY(YI)) SET myYKEY=myYKEY_YKEY(YI) IF YI'=YMAXKEY IF $GET(YKEY(YI+1))'="" SET myYKEY=myYKEY_"," . set oldYFELD = "" . if myYKEY'="" set oldYFELD = $$^WWWSETL("^"_YDATEI_"("_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI,1)_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(myYKEY)_",1)",1) . ; . ;------------------------------------- . ; Data Validation . ;------------------------------------- . SET YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YI)) QUIT:YI="" DO . . set YTYP = $$GetInputType(YDATEI,YI,YFORM) ;16123 . . SET YSPX = $PIECE($GET(^WWW003(0,YDATEI,YI,1)),Y,17) . . DO PRUEFD^WWWSAVD(oldYFELD) . . IF YSPX=1 SET ^WWWDLF(0,YDATEI,YI,YBED,1)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) . ; . IF YOK=0 DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(59)_" "_$$^WWWTEXT(86)) QUIT ;FEHLER ; error ; "Primary Key Not Available!" - FIXME: data error not "Primary Key" <GRF> . ; . ;------------------------------------- . set YKEY = myYKEY . SET KEYKEY=$TRANSLATE(YKEY,"""") . SET FELDFELD=YFELD . ; . ;OPEN . IF YALLKEY=9 SET YOK=9 . ; . ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ . ; YVOR D16 $$$WWW120ExecuteOnAfterSaveData() . ; D18 $$$WWW120ExecuteAfterDataModified() . ; D23 $$$WWW120AuthorizationToModifyData() . ; D89 $$$WWW120ExecuteOnBeforeSaveData() . ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ . ; . ;SAVE . SET YAEND=1 ;=ÄNDERUNG . IF $FIND(YFELD,"() Error: URL Problem: SendRequest: java") SET ^WWWSOR(YUSER,1)="Explorer: () Error: URL Problem: SendRequest: java|" ;FEHLER ;shortcoming . ; . quit:$$OnBeforeSave() . ; . set strStatus = $$$OK . ; . ;********* Save ************* . ; . ;#### Start Transaction Unit ################################ ; SR15947 . ;#### if Save and Execute After Save gets processed as 1 unit . ;#### 1 - remember current error handler . ;#### 2 - change $ztrap to Transaction Error Handler . ;#### 3 - start transaction and try to lock tables . ;#### strTStatus = 1 -> Transaction Started, Locks set . ;#### strTStatus = 0 -> Transaction NOT Started, NO Locks set . if ($$$WWW120ExclAfterSave(YVOR)'=$$$YES) set strTZtrap=$ztrap,$ztrap="TransactionUnitError^COMTransaction" do ;!!!! "set $ztrap..." MUST BE IN SAME LINE TO BE IN SAME FRAMESTACK !!! . . set strTStatus = $$StartUnit^COMTransaction(YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave") . ;############################################################ . ;############################################################ . ; . new pblnDoOnBeforeSave . set pblnDoOnBeforeSave = $$$NO . IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 IF YALLKEY'=9 SET YOK=$$^WWWSPEI(YDATEI,YKEY,YFELD,0,,,.strStatus,pblnDoOnBeforeSave) SET $PIECE(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1),Y,22)=YOK ;KOPF AUS ;SAVE DES DATENSATZES . IF YOK=0 DO QUIT . . ;#### End Transaction Unit - EARLY QUIT ########### . . ;#### If Save failed (Soft/- or Hardfail): . . ;#### 1 - Commit the Transaction (only if started) . . ;#### 2 - Change the Error Handler back to default . . if ($$$WWW120ExclAfterSave(YVOR)'=$$$YES) do . . . set:$$$ISOK(strTStatus) strTStatus=$$EndUnit^COMTransaction(YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave",strTStatus,"") . . ;################################################## . . if $$$ISERR(strStatus) DO ^WWWINFO($$$Text(strStatus)) //VARCode has set an error message. . . if $$$ISOK(strStatus) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(141)) //Otherwise, use default - "In Use" . ; . IF YOK'=9 IF YOK'=1 SET YCHANGE=1 IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,18)'="" IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 DO ^WWWFORM5 XECUTE $PIECE(YVOR,Y,18) ;EXECUTE BEI AENDERUNG ;EXECUTE next to . ; . ;**** Execute After Save ***** . IF YOK'=9 IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,23)'=3 IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 DO . . ; . . IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)'=1 && (($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)'="") || ($data(^WWWTransactionLine(0,YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave")))) DO . . . SET:$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16))="#" $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16),2,99) . . . DO ^WWWFORM5 . . . DO ^WWWLESE(YDATEI,YKEY) ;LESEN WERTE ;read . . . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)'="" XECUTE $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16) ;EXECUTE NACH SPEICHERN Q=1 = FORM NICHT MEHR ANZEIGEN ;EXECUTE AFTER SAVE ; Q=1: do not display form . . . ; . . . ;### Execute Transaction Unit ### . . . do . . . . if $$$WWW120ExclAfterSave(YVOR)'=$$$YES quit:'$$$ISOK(strTStatus) ;expects strTStatus form StartUnit . . . . set strTStatus = $$TransactionUnit^COMTransaction(YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave",'$$$WWW120ExclAfterSave(YVOR),.strTError,.Q) . . . ; . . . IF $$EXIST^%R("Y"_YFORM_"onSave.OBJ",$GET(YUCI)) XECUTE "DO ^Y"_YFORM_"onSave" ;CUSTOMIZED EXECUTE;FIS;24947;03.02.04 . ; . ;#### End Transaction Unit - STANDARD QUIT #### . ;#### 1 - Commit or Rollback the Transaction (depending on strTStatus / strTError) . ;#### 2 - Change the Error Handler back to defeult . ;#### 3 - In case of Rollback: Change Save Flag to Hardfail and Quit . if ($$$WWW120ExclAfterSave(YVOR)'=$$$YES) do set $ztrap = strTZtrap ;!!!! "set $ztrap..." MUST BE IN SAME LINE TO BE IN SAME FRAMESTACK !!! . . set strTStatus = $$EndUnit^COMTransaction(YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave",strTStatus,$get(strTError)) . . if '$$$ISOK(strTStatus) set YOK = 0 . ;############################## . ; . IF YOK'=9 IF YRICHT="" IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,23)<2 IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=1 IF $TRANSLATE($GET(YFKEY),","_"""")'=$TRANSLATE(YKEY,","_"""") IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,149)=1 SET YKEY=$PIECE(YKEY,",",1,$LENGTH(YKEY,",")-1) ;TYBD;WENN VORGABE = 1 IMMER NEUE DATENERFASSUNG ;when default constantly data gathering . ; . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY ;KEY . IF YKFEHL=0 IF YOPEN=2 SET YOK=9 KILL ^WWWSOR(YUSER) ;2.SEITE KEINE PRÜF ;no . ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- . ; Form Type 3 : GRID FORM . ; WENN GRID ODER OHNE PRIM KEY DANN DATENSATZ LÖSCHEN ;when Or without PRIM KEY data record Delete . ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- . IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=3 SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",YMAXKEY)="" SET %(YQUERY,"YKEY")=YKEY SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY ;LÖSCHEN LETZTER KEY BEI GRIDFELDER=NUR ANZEIGE IN GRID FÜR NEUERFASSUNG ;Delete last KEY next to Show within to . ; . ;WENN ERFOLGREICH ;when successful . IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)=1 DO . . SET %("VAR","YFORM")=YFORM_"t" ;ZEITABHÄNGIGE VORGABE ;default . . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY_","_$$^WWWDATE1($GET(%(YQUERY,"Y"_YFORM_"P"_(YMAXKEY+1)))) . ; . IF $GET(Q)'=1 IF YOK=9||('$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1) DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;ANZEIGE FORM NACH ERFOLGREICHEM SAVE ;Show shape within . ; . ;WENN MELDUNG (Z.B. FEHLER) ;when status signal . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)=YFELD . SET YA="",YI="" . FOR SET YI=$ORDER(^WWWSOR(YUSER,YI)) QUIT:YI="" IF +YI'=0 DO . . SET YA=YA_$GET(^WWWSOR(YUSER,YI)) . . SET YKILL=2 ;BERICHTIGUNG NOETIG ;correction . . IF $GET(YAEND)=1 SET YKILL=3 . . SET %("VAR","YKILL")=YKILL . ; . IF $DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 IF YA="" SET YA=$$^WWWTEXT(391) ; "Not Saved!" ;NICHT GESPEICHERT;TYBD;10,2,2004 . if '$data(@("^"_YDATEI_"("_$$^WWWYM(YDATEI,1)_$$^WWWKEYBUILD(YKEY)_",1)")) do . . SET %("VAR","YKEY") = "" . . SET YKEY = "" . . set YFELD = "" . DO ^WWWINFO(YA,,$GET(YLINK)) . WRITE " " ;RETURN SOME DATA;TYBD;4,2,2004
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Forms from type ; Form Type 2 : LIST GENERATOR ; Form Type 4 : MANUAL INPUT (WITH BUTTON) ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ; D16 $$$WWW120ExecuteOnAfterSaveData() ;+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)'="" && ($extract($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16),1)'=";") DO . SET YEXEC=$PIECE(YVOR,Y,16) . if $$$WWW120DoNotPrepareHTMLSkeleton(YVOR) = $$$YES set YEXEC = "#"_YEXEC //Do Not Prepare HTML Skeleton . DO PGMSTART^WWWMANU ;MANUELLE ;WENN YNOLIST=1 DANN SOLL DIE LISTE NICHT ANGEZEIGT WERDEN ;when who list Not will
if $data(^WWWTransactionLine(0,YFORM,"ExecuteAfterSave")){ set YEXEC = "set strTStatus = $$TransactionUnit^COMTransaction(YFORM,""ExecuteAfterSave"",,.strTError)" if $$$WWW120DoNotPrepareHTMLSkeleton(YVOR) = $$$YES set YEXEC = "#"_YEXEC //Do Not Prepare HTML Skeleton if ($piece(YVOR,Y,16)'="") && ($extract($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16),1)'=";") set YEXEC = "#"_YEXEC set YNOFOOT=1 //HTML already prepared do PGMSTART^WWWMANU }
IF $$EXIST^%R("Y"_YFORM_"onSave.OBJ",$GET(YUCI)) XECUTE "DO ^Y"_YFORM_"onSave" ;CUSTOMIZED EXECUTE;FIS;24947;03.02.04
;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Form Type 2 : LIST GENERATOR ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF $$$WWW120FormType(YVOR)=2 DO . QUIT:$GET(YNOLIST)=1 ;LISTE NICHTMEHR ANZEIGEN NACH MANUELLEM EXECUTE;TYBD;23,6,2004;25978 . DO ^WWWLIST0 ;LISTGENERATOR
LOCK -^WWWUSER(0,YUSER) QUIT
OnBeforeSave() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Run OnBeforeSave code (if not doing hyper validation) ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: boolean - whether to stop save happening ; ; History: ; 27-Sep-2007 GRF SR15603: Macro change ; 10-Aug-2006 JW SR13594: Created ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new blnStop,strExec
if '$$$HYPERValidation(YFORM) do . ; . set strExec = $$$WWW120ExecuteOnBeforeSaveData(YVOR) . IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 IF strExec'="" SET:$EXTRACT(strExec)="#" strExec=$EXTRACT(strExec,2,99) DO ^WWWFORM5 XECUTE strExec IF $GET(Q)=1 DO QUIT ;;EXECUTE VOR SPEICHERN Q:FORMULAR FERTIG ;EXECUTE pre- Save ready-made . . IF $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" DO ;TYBD;ALTE WERTE ANZEIGEN BEI FEHLER ;display next to shortcoming . . . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=$GET(YKEY) ;KEY . . . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)=YFELD . . . SET YKILL=2 . . . IF $GET(YAEND)=1 SET YKILL=3 . . . SET %("VAR","YKILL")=YKILL . . . DO ^WWWFORM . ; . IF '$DATA(^WWWSOR(YUSER,1))#10=1 IF $$EXIST^%R("Y"_YFORM_"onBeforeSave.OBJ",$GET(YUCI)) DO ^WWWFORM5 XECUTE "DO ^Y"_YFORM_"onBeforeSave" IF $GET(Q)=1 DO QUIT ;CUSTOMIZING EXECUTE VOR SPEICHERN Q:FORMULAR FERTIG;FIS;11.03.04;25316 . . IF $$$WWWUSERHTMLStarted(^WWWUSER(0,YUSER,1))="" DO ;TYBD;ALTE WERTE ANZEIGEN BEI FEHLER ;display next to shortcoming . . . SET %("VAR","YKEY")=$GET(YKEY) ;KEY . . . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)=YFELD . . . SET YKILL=2 . . . IF $GET(YAEND)=1 SET YKILL=3 . . . SET %("VAR","YKILL")=YKILL . . . DO ^WWWFORM
set blnStop = ($GET(Q)=1) quit blnStop
Wizard() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Wizard form type ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 08-Aug-2006 JW SR13594: Created (encapsulated) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW YI,YBBN
DO . IF $GET(YOPTION)="" SET YOPTION=$GET(%(YQUERY,"YOPTION")) . SET $PIECE(YOPTION,"#",10)=$PIECE($GET(YOPTION),"#",10)+1 . FOR YI=1:1:9 IF $GET(YKEY(YI))'="" SET $PIECE(YOPTION,"#",YI)=$GET(YKEY(YI)) SET $PIECE(YOPTION,"#",10)="" ;PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL SICHERN ;safeguard . FOR YI=1:1:70 IF $PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI)'="" SET $PIECE(YPARA,"#",YI)=$PIECE(YFELD,Y,YI) SET $PIECE(YOPTION,"#",10)=YI ;DATENFELDER UND MERKER FÜR LFD FELD ;And to field . IF $GET(YOPTION)'="" SET %("VAR","YOPTION")=YOPTION . IF $GET(YPARA)'="" SET %("VAR","YPARA") =YPARA . ; . SET YBBN=$PIECE($GET(YOPTION),"#",10) . SET YBBN=$ORDER(^WWW122s(0,5,$$^WWWUMLAU(YFORM,1),YBBN)) . IF YBBN'="" DO ^WWWFORM QUIT ;WEITERER FELDER . SET YVOR=$GET(^WWW120(0,YFORM,1)) ;PRUEFEN EXECUTE . KILL %("VAR","YPARA") . KILL %("VAR","YOPTION") . KILL %(YQUERY,"YPARA") . KILL %(YQUERY,"YOPTION") . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,59)'="" DO . . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,59))="#" SET $PIECE(YVOR,Y,59)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,59),2,99) . . XECUTE $PIECE(YVOR,Y,59) ;EXE NACH DATENFELD ;within data item . ; . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)'="" DO . . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16))="#" SET $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16)=$EXTRACT($PIECE(YVOR,Y,16),2,99) . . XECUTE $PIECE(YVOR,Y,16) ;EXE NACH DATENFELD ;within data item
QUIT
BufferSave() ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Fast Save ? ; ; Params: ; ; ByRefs: ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 08-Aug-2006 JW SR13594: Created (encapsulated) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- do . SET YMAXKEY = 0 . IF YDATEI'="" SET YMAXKEY = +$ORDER(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1) . SET YKEY = "" . FOR YI=1:1:YMAXKEY SET YKEY = YKEY_$GET(YKEY(YI)) IF YI'=YMAXKEY SET YKEY=YKEY_"," . SET FFFELD = $TRANSLATE(YFELD,$CHAR(13,10),"|") . SET FMFELD = $TRANSLATE(YMFELD,$CHAR(13,10),"|") . SET FFKEY = YKEY . SET FFFORM = YFORM . DO ^WWWFORM2 ;SPEICHERN ;Save . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="HELP" SET %("VAR","EP")="WWWHELP" DO ^WWWHELP QUIT ;HILFE ;help . IF $FIND(YOPEN,"^") SET YEXEC=$PIECE(YOPEN,"#",2) IF YEXEC'="" XECUTE YEXEC QUIT ;SONDER EXECUTE . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="SEAR" DO ^WWWSEAR QUIT ;SUCHEN ;search . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="FORM" DO QUIT . . NEW YFORM1 . . SET YFORM1=YFORM . . SET YFORM=$EXTRACT(YOPEN,9,99) . . SET %("VAR","YFORM")=$PIECE(YFORM,"|",1) . . IF $PIECE(YFORM,"|",1)'="" IF +$PIECE($GET(^WWW121(0,$PIECE(YFORM,"|",1),1,1)),Y,16)'=0 SET %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY ;WENN VORGABE BENÖTIGT ;when default . . ;SET YMAP=$PIECE(YFORM,"|",2) . . SET YMAP=$$^WWWTRANSLATE($PIECE(YFORM,"|",2),""","""") ;FIS;13.01.04;ANFÜHRUNGSZEICHEN ÜBERGEBEN . . IF YMAP'="" DO . . . DO . . . . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YMAP,"=",1))="""" SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",+$PIECE(YMAP,"=",2)) = $TRANSLATE($PIECE(YMAP,"=",1),"""") QUIT ;FIS;13.01.04;FESTER WERT ;worthy . . . . IF $EXTRACT($PIECE(YMAP,"=",1))="P" SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",+$PIECE(YMAP,"=",2)) = $PIECE(FFKEY,",",+$EXTRACT($PIECE(YMAP,"=",1),2,99)) QUIT ;FIS;27.09.04;26416;AUS PRIMÄRSCHLÜSSEL . . . . SET $PIECE(YKEY,",",+$PIECE(YMAP,"=",2)) = $PIECE(FFFELD,Y,+$PIECE(YMAP,"=",1)) ;AUS DATENFELD ;out of data item . . . ; . . . SET %("VAR","YKEY") = YKEY . . . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM1,"D",1) = FFFELD . . . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM1,"M",1) = FMFELD . . . SET ^WWWUSE(0,YUSER,YFORM1,"P",1) = FFKEY . . ; . . DO ^WWWFORM . ; . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="EXEC" SET YEXEC=$EXTRACT(YOPEN,9,99) SET %("VAR","YEXEC")=YEXEC SET:$TRANSLATE($GET(YKEY),"+")'="" %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY DO ^WWWMANU . IF $EXTRACT(YOPEN,5,8)="MANU" SET YEXEC=$EXTRACT(YOPEN,9,99) SET %("VAR","YEXEC")=YEXEC SET:$TRANSLATE($GET(YKEY),"+")'="" %("VAR","YKEY")=YKEY DO ^WWWMANU1
quit
GetInputType(pidClass,pintField,pidForm) ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Determines the InputType, including customisation if YFORM is defined ; ; Called By: Validate^WWWSAVED, START^WWWSAVE (2), ^WWWSAVV, START^WWWSAVE ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 09-Dec-2008 GRF SR16123: InputType need not be "int". ; 06-Nov-2008 shobby SR16123 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- new enumInputType
set enumInputType = $$$WWW003InputType($GET(^WWW003(0,pidClass,pintField,1))) if (pidForm'="") && ($order(^WWW122s(0,4,pintField,pidForm,""))'="") { set enumInputType = $$$WWW122InputType($$Get^WWW122(pidForm,$order(^WWW122s(0,4,pintField,pidForm,"")))) } quit enumInputType
